name: Watercress Salad With Shaved Beets, Walnuts and Roquefort
recipeIngredient: 8 cups watercress (about 5 bunches), heavy stems removed
2 medium beets, trimmed, peeled and coarsely grated

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk together the orange juice, lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Place the watercress in a large bowl and toss with the dressing. Add the beets and walnuts. Divide among 4 plates and sprinkle with the Roquefort. Serve immediately.
